translations: 发出闪光之物；闪光装置；暴露狂

sentences.translation: 是我们抓住了那个变态，耶！

sentences.sentence: Would be great to get some very good and reliable flasher.
sentences.translation: 将是巨大的，以得到一些很好的和可靠的闪光。

sentences.sentence: E3 flasher is a special device to help you programme NAND and NOR flash data.
sentences.translation: E3的闪光是一个特殊的装置，以帮助您计划NAND和NOR闪存的数据。
